regen.new_specification: The system shall provide feedback indicating the success or failure of the retry attempt after a status request is reissued.
The system shall alert the operator if multiple consecutive requests to a device remain unresponsive to facilitate timely intervention.

regen.absent_element: notification for continuous failure after retries
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the operator if the retries continue to fail after a predefined number of attempts.

label: Failure to receive a valid status after a configurable number of retries shall be considered a device failure.
absence: situation of several number of failed retries
